title: Zombie Hunter Train
text:
3:00 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Outdoors | Recreation Come join us on a zombie hunt! We'll take our antique train out to "zombie country", where you'll "hunt" the undead with paintball guns. The Zombie Apocalypse has occurred, changing life in Ventura County forever. The global zombie infestation has spread rapidly, overwhelming everything in it's path. We need zombie hunters to take Ventura County back from the Undead! Join our Zombie Hunting Army on our Battle Train! You will be armed with a paintball gun loaded with flesh eating toxic paintballs. The Zombies now populate the Earth with an undying hunger for live human flesh. Do you have it in you to return the Undead to the Dead?? This Halloween season, why spend 30 minutes in an almost-scary "haunted" house? Take a two hour antique train ride to the battleground of the Zombie Apocalypse! The train is haunted, so you'll have to keep your wits about you! Help save humanity! Paintball guns, safety equipment and paintballs are included in the ticket price. Zombie Hunters must be 10 years of age and older. Two departures, 3:00 pm & 5:30 pm, on each of the following dates-10/17, 10/24, 10/25, 10/30, & 10/31. Refreshments will be an extra charge. (Outside food or beverages are not allowed.) Extra paint balls will be available for purchase. Advance ticket purchase required, visit www.fwry.com or www.zombiehuntertrain.com or call 805-524-2546. No refunds or exchanges-we run rain or shine. Zombie Hunters 10 years old and up-$49 Under Age 10 or train ride only-$25
